getStorageId().Description: Returns the storage ID for the MTP object's storage unit

getAssociationType().Description: Returns the association type for the MTP object Will be zero objects that are not of format @B_android#mtp#MtpConstants#FORMAT_ASSOCIATION_E@ For directories the association type is typically @B_android#mtp#MtpConstants#ASSOCIATION_TYPE_GENERIC_FOLDER_E@

getThumbCompressedSize().Description: Returns the size of the MTP object's thumbnail Will be zero for objects with no thumbnail

getImagePixWidthLong().Description: Returns the width of the MTP object in pixels Will be zero for non-image objects

getDateCreated().Description: Returns the creation date of the MTP object The value is represented as milliseconds since January 1, 1970

getParent().Description: Returns the object handle for the object's parent Will be zero for the root directory of a storage unit

getProtectionStatus().Description: Returns the protection status for the MTP object Possible values are: @B_android#mtp#MtpConstants#PROTECTION_STATUS_NONE_E@ @B_android#mtp#MtpConstants#PROTECTION_STATUS_READ_ONLY_E@ @B_android#mtp#MtpConstants#PROTECTION_STATUS_NON_TRANSFERABLE_DATA_E@

getAssociationDesc().Description: Returns the association description for the MTP object Will be zero objects that are not of format @B_android#mtp#MtpConstants#FORMAT_ASSOCIATION_E@

getThumbPixHeightLong().Description: Returns the height of the MTP object's thumbnail in pixels Will be zero for objects with no thumbnail

getImagePixHeightLong().Description: Returns the height of the MTP object in pixels Will be zero for non-image objects

getObjectHandle().Description: Returns the object handle for the MTP object

getThumbPixHeight().Description: Returns the height of the MTP object's thumbnail in pixels Will be zero for objects with no thumbnail

getImagePixDepth().Description: Returns the depth of the MTP object in bits per pixel Will be zero for non-image objects

getImagePixDepthLong().Description: Returns the depth of the MTP object in bits per pixel Will be zero for non-image objects

getThumbPixWidth().Description: Returns the width of the MTP object's thumbnail in pixels Will be zero for objects with no thumbnail

getCompressedSize().Description: Returns the size of the MTP object

Returns: the object's name This value will never be null.
getName().Description: Returns the name of the MTP object

getThumbPixWidthLong().Description: Returns the width of the MTP object's thumbnail in pixels Will be zero for objects with no thumbnail

getThumbFormat().Description: Returns the format code for the MTP object's thumbnail Will be zero for objects with no thumbnail

getDateModified().Description: Returns the modification date of the MTP object The value is represented as milliseconds since January 1, 1970

getImagePixWidth().Description: Returns the width of the MTP object in pixels Will be zero for non-image objects

getImagePixHeight().Description: Returns the height of the MTP object in pixels Will be zero for non-image objects

Returns: the object's keyword list This value will never be null.
getKeywords().Description: Returns a comma separated list of keywords for the MTP object

getSequenceNumber().Description: Returns the sequence number for the MTP object This field is typically not used for MTP devices, but is sometimes used to define a sequence of photos on PTP cameras.

getSequenceNumberLong().Description: Returns the sequence number for the MTP object This field is typically not used for MTP devices, but is sometimes used to define a sequence of photos on PTP cameras.

getThumbCompressedSizeLong().Description: Returns the size of the MTP object's thumbnail Will be zero for objects with no thumbnail

getFormat().Description: Returns the format code for the MTP object

getCompressedSizeLong().Description: Returns the size of the MTP object

ClassDesc: This class encapsulates information about an object on an MTP device. This corresponds to the ObjectInfo Dataset described in section 5.3.1 of the MTP specification.
